actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to establish an emergency human nutrition food reserve which shall be available to help meet emergency food conditions in any area of the United States of any foreign country which suffers a severe loss of its food supply as the result of a natural disaster.

summary.text: World Food Reserve Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a food reserve to help meet emergency food conditions in any area of the United States or in any foreign country which suffers a severe loss of its food supply because of a natural disaster. Authorizes the Secretary to permit foreign countries to participate in the program by purchasing certain commodities and paying the required storage and handling costs.

titles.title: A bill to establish an emergency human nutrition food reserve which shall be available to help meet emergency food conditions in any area of the United States of any foreign country which suffers a severe loss of its food supply as the result of a natural disaster.
